text: @NelsonHavi Haha 🤣 they should hold another party like it... and COVID-19 will have helped us get rid of so many washenzis in one swoop! You can’t put on mask when eating/drinking that’s why bars/eateries were closed! See how they are mingling Another party pls..washenzi waende na corona😂
